messages.content: pfg-ComfyUI is a ComfyUI version of a project available at https://github.com/laksjdjf/pfg-webui.
Where should I clone the pfg-ComfyUI repo?
The pfg-ComfyUI repo should be cloned in the 'ComfyUI/custom_nodes' directory.
Where do I get the pfg model from?
The pfg model is obtained from https://huggingface.co/furusu/PFG.
Where should the pfg model be placed after downloading?
After downloading the pfg model, it should be placed in the 'PFG-ComfyUI/models' directory.
How do I use the pfg node?
To use the pfg node, open it from the 'loaders' section and connect the 'CONDITIONING' from the Prompt to the Sampler.
